授業目的: The aim of this course is to acquaint students with conceptual approaches and perspectives relevant to the understanding of conflict, and further familiarize students with issues and cases of actual conflicts. The overall objective is to introduce students to the field of international conflict studies in particular and international politics in general.
到達目標: Students will learn and become knowledgeable about fundamental concepts and theories of conflict. Students will develop a better understanding of the complex issues that cause international conflicts by studying actual cases of conflicts. Additionally, students will learn and become familiar with different aspects of the impacts of conflict, and  many ways of dealing with conflicts.
授業方法: This is a lecture-based course that is conducted both face to face and online simultaneously.
